themes: parity between visual artists and musicians
key_phrases: Centralized calendar to view what opportunities are available in the next month
Artist Development resources for visual artists matching what is available for musicians
barriers_identified: lack of centralized information on opportunities
insufficient artist development resources for visual artists compared to musicians
solutions_proposed: Create a centralized calendar filterable by medium of work
Provide artist development resources for visual artists equivalent to those for musicians
Organize community showcases at large events
Develop a directory and statewide network
Foster local, national, and international partnerships
